@Override protected RestChannelConsumer innerPrepareRequest(RestRequest request, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     try (XContentParser parser = request.contentParser()) {         final InvalidateTokenRequest invalidateTokenRequest = PARSER.parse(parser, null).         return channel -> client.execute(InvalidateTokenAction.INSTANCE, invalidateTokenRequest, new RestBuilderListener<InvalidateTokenResponse>(channel) {              @Override             public RestResponse buildResponse(InvalidateTokenResponse invalidateResp, XContentBuilder builder) throws Exception {                 invalidateResp.toXContent(builder, channel.request()).                 return new BytesRestResponse(RestStatus.OK, builder).             }         }).     } }
